name: Soulspore
description:
A spooky first person puzzle game where you control two halves of a split soul to collect the 4 keys to activate the portal that will alow you to recombine into one soul again.

Controls:

  • Left click - Toggle handtorch
  • Right click - Grab small crate, click again to throw
  • E - Toggle control between soul halves
  • Space - Jump

Made during a game jam for university :

Bradley - Programmer and lighting

Evie - Programmer, UI, Source control management

Sophie - Level design and construction

Alex - Audio design, Worldbuilding

Alfie - Asset modelling and final packaging

Louis - Concept, textures and puzzles
